classes.description: Container for a skinny header only system notification

classes.description: Container for a skinny body copy only system notification

classes.description: Container for a system notification

classes.description: Class to format heading text

classes.description: Class to format heading and content rendered

classes.description: wraps a notification banner queue

classes.description: Class to format content rendered (description text and secondary)

classes.description: Class to format content rendered (description text and secondary)

classes.description: Class to format heading text

classes.description: class to add description text width

classes.description: Class to position icon associated to type

classes.description: Class to fill icon accordingly for high-severity-primary
